opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Thomas v. Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. And Montague v. Asplundh Tree Expert Co

opinion:
541 U.S. 968

THOMAS
v.
WAL-MART STORES, INC.; and
MONTAGUE
v.
ASPLUNDH TREE EXPERT CO.

No. 03-1077.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 29, 2004.

1

C. A. 11th Cir. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition. Reported below: 85 Fed. Appx. 193 (second judgment); 87 Fed. Appx. 714 (first judgment).
